author: andschwa
body: From Andrew on PSCore   In short, .NET Reflection was used to access FileSystemProvider's members in C# test code for TTest test harness. Going forward we need to have test code as PS scripts for Pester test harness.      create test plan documentation     generate test cases test matrix     code test suite     working in linux?  VSO create date - 8/6/2015 9:52:00
title: Test FileSystem Provider more thoroughly.
